dict.acceptation: 反馈；（音频系统的输出信号在输入端收到时发生的）反馈杂音；回复；自动调节（把机器的输出数据提供给自控装置以纠正偏差）；

sent.orig: Fourth, information feedback it includes audience feedback, the feedback effect, the implementation of feedback. etc.
sent.trans: 信息反馈包括：受众反馈、实施效果反馈、执行反馈等。

sent.orig: Servo valves consists of feedback - electric-hydraulic servo valve and position feedback servo valves.
sent.trans: 伺服阀主要分为力反馈式电液伺服阀和位置反馈式伺服阀。

sent.orig: As such, current-feedback amps can better solve high-speed problems than their voltage-feedback counterparts.
sent.trans: 像这样，电流反馈比电压反馈放大器能更好的解决高速问题。

sent.orig: Positive feedback will be a made when payment is received and return positive feedback is appreciated.
sent.trans: If一个满意的原因时作出付款，收到积极的反馈和回报是赞赏。

sent.orig: Substantial feedback will be offered. Trainee s feedback and suggestions are also considered.
sent.trans: 会有充分的回馈信息，培训生的反馈和建议会被予以考虑。
